title: DSSSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 615 Caretaker, Assistant, Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The Delhi Subordinate Service Selection Board (DSSSB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 615 Statistical Clerk, Surveyor, Stenographer, Assistant Librarian, Caretaker, Forest Guard, Account, Work Assistant, Music Teacher, Assistant Security Officer, and Other Posts. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, Diploma, Any Degree, CA, MBA, Post Graduation, B.Ed. can apply for the DSSSB Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit,...
